Name: Xathrid Gorgon
Text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\n{2}{B}, {T}: Put a petrification counter on target creature. It gains defender and becomes a colorless artifact in addition to its other types. Its activated abilities can't be activated. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

Name: Cathedral of War
Text: Cathedral of War enters the battlefield tapped.\nExalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\n{T}: Add {C}.

Name: Staff of Nin
Text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card.\n{T}: Staff of Nin deals 1 damage to any target.

Name: Mwonvuli Beast Tracker
Text: When Mwonvuli Beast Tracker enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with deathtouch, hexproof, reach, or trample and reveal it. Shuffle and put that card on top.

Name: Magmaquake
Text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.
